title: Send delivery address info to seller
description:
Selects a delivery address for an auction you've won and sends that
  information, along with an optional phone number and message, to the seller.
  Do not use this API if the buyer is planning to pay with Pay Now, since the
  Pay Now process already includes this step. An address can only be sent once;
  the buyer must contact the seller directly if there was a mistake.
permission_required:
BiddingAndBuying: Place bids, and complete purchases using Buy Now &
      Fixed Price Offers.

fields.name: PurchaseId
fields.description:
The purchase ID of the item that was won. This can be obtained from the
        Won Items API or from the Buy Now API.

fields.name: DeliveryAddressId
fields.description:
The ID of the delivery address to send to the seller (returned by the
        add address API or via the retrieve delivery addresses API).

fields.name: ReturnListingDetails
fields.description:
Indicates whether full listing details should be returned in the
        response.

returns.description: <SendDeliveryAddressResponse> Indicates whether or not the operation succeeded.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
